patients-login-subtitle: Login to get free access to Dentacoin’s patient loyalty applications!
patients-register-title: Register to get free access to Dentacoin’s patient loyalty applications!
request-account-subtitle: You can access Dentacoin HubApp only if you are a patient of Dentacoin partner dental practice.
dentist-request-account-title: GET YOUR OWN PATIENT APP FOR FREE
dentist-request-account-subtitle: Dentacoin HubApp is currently available only to Dentacoin Partner dentists. Fill in the form below to request your own free patient loyalty app.
request-account-thank-you: THANK YOU. Our team will check the records and contact you.
change-password-response-error: Your request for password change has failed. Please try again and make sure there are no empty fields.
account-saved-successfully: Your account changes have been saved successfully.
account-saving-failed: Your account changes saving failed. Please try again later.
password-change-failed: Your password change failed. Please try again later.
fullName-max-length: Your name maximum length is 100 symbols.
fname-max-length: First name maximum length is 100 symbols.
lname-max-length: Last name maximum length is 100 symbols.
dentist-name-max-length: Your dentist name must be with maximum length of 200 symbols.
practice-max-length: Dental practice name maximum length is 200 symbols.
website-max-length: Dental practice website maximum length is 500 symbols.
delete-profile-text: We can delete your Profile along with all your personal data from our servers. Just keep in mind that this will terminate your account irreversibly. If you are sure about that, just click the button below.
download-data-text: You can request to receive all your personal data stored on our servers. Just click on the button below to download it.
address-validation: Wallet Address should be starting with '0x' and having 42 symbols length.
wrong-account: Wrong account. Please try again with different credentials.
thank-you: Thank you. You are all set. You can download the application or continue with the desktop version.
password-changed-successfully-login: You have successfully changed your password. Please login.
request-account-saving-failed: Please enter your email and we'll send you a recovery link.
request-account-deletion-failed: Your account request deletion failed. Please try again later.
request-account-data-download-failed: Your account request data download failed. Please try again later.
general-error: Something went wrong. Please try again later or write a message to admin@dentacoin.com with description of the problem.
dentist-auth-failed: Wrong dentist account credentials. If you don't have an account yet, you can request it now.
not-a-partner-error: Dentacoin HubApp is accessible only for Dentacoin Partners. Request your access now!
patient-login-failed-missing-email: Your account is missing email. Please head to https://dentacoin.com and login there. You'll be asked to enter a new email and come back to Dentacoin HubApp.
patient-login-failed-not-a-patient-of-an: You are not associated as patient of any Dentacoin partner dentist. Ask your dentist for an invite or submit your request to admin@dentacoin.com .
i-confirm: I confirm that I'm 18 years of age or older.
privacy-policy-agree: Please agree with our Privacy Policy.
years-and-privacy-error: Please confirm that you are 18 years of age or older and agree to our Privacy Policy.
cookies-error: Please accept the strictly necessary cookies in order to continue with your login.
my-patients-page-subtitle: Invite your patients to download the HubApp and boost patient loyalty!
push-notification-page-subtitle: Send customized push notifications to patients with ease.
push-notifications-date-description: Selected time is in UTC+0 timezone.
push-notifications-missing-patients: You cannot submit a push notification. You don't have any patients yet.
missing-patient-account-error: It looks like you don't have an account yet.
dentist-helper: This is the main screen of your patient loyalty app. Click "Edit page" to customize it.
account-not-found: Account not found. You need to be invited by your dentist in order to use Dentacoin HubApp.
banner-title-desktop: Get your patient loyalty rewards on the go!
banner-title-mobile: Enjoy the full benefits and loyalty rewards!
